name: New Off-Road Coach Bus Driving
description:
Get ready to enjoy the Off-road Coach Bus Simulation. Wonderful interiors, incredible vehicles will make you feel a realistic coach bus driving experience on the off road paths! Travel through the hills and dangerous paths to reach the destination and also show your coach bus driving skills.This game is special made for the fun driving lovers. Off road Tour Coach bus driving is a 3d simulator where you play as a bus driver of hill climbing roads to reach at the location on time. Feel the adventure of thunderstorm, rain, snow but do not forget the sunny days on the hills. It’s your real task to drive through all kind of seasons. And if you are one of those who like precision driving games like hill climb simulator you will also like this Off-road Coach Bus driving simulator with real Off road coach driving features. Take people from one place to another may be one beautiful resorts, show them amazing places and landscapes.

Off-Road Coach Bus Driving & Parking Simulator is full of thrill and adventure to pick up and drop passengers to their destination. Real hill climb experience of racing.
Enjoy hours of non-stop fun with this hill climb racing bus simulator. Get ready for off-road hill driving in this 3d bus simulator with hill climber adventure. Ensure safety but have fun too!

Adventurous and crazy bus off-road bus driving with real-time physics, hill top driving, twisted turns and breathtaking game play scenes will going to add spices in your driving passion. Driving a crazy bus off-road tour with big hurdles while driving on these hills and mountains.Bus simulator, driver your bus in hill, skill is very important, bus parking missions look easy but really hard, touch buttons to gas or brake bus, feeling the real bus racing. Unlock new levels, you will see amazing environments.

Escape the rush life of busy city and explore hill tracks in off-road bus driver simulator. Show off pro drive skills and master bus parking ingenuity in racing vehicles. Hold steering, press clutch and shift gears from gearbox for driving gigantic vehicles.

Download Off-Road Coach Bus Driving & Parking Simulator on App Store and enjoy one of the best simulation game of all time.

Game Features
- Real Buses Collection
- HD Graphics
- Live Radio
- Adjustable controls
- 10 different languages
- Different Offroad Environments
- Realistic and difficult gameplay
- Reverse Camera
- Ultra Smooth and intelligent control
- High octane Buses & insane action
- Multiple Realistic physics based buses
- Most Authentic Offroad locations!
- Beautiful 3D graphics and amazing environment
- Challenging Gameplay
- Buttons, Steer, Tilt Controls
- Driver Cam Mode
